title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in a dynamic text item is different from the format displayed in a data/text item.
OB: The datetime values retrieved from the table are displayed differently in the dynamic text item compared to the data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Insert a text item, a data item, and a dynamic text item in the application.
2. Save and preview the application.

Expected result:
The datetime values displayed in all three items should be in the same format.

Actual result:
The datetime values displayed in the data item and the text item are the same, but the datetime value displayed in the dynamic text item is different.
